text:
Update the Memory Bank to reflect the addition of Vietnamese input support.

1.  **Review Changes**: The following changes were made:
    *   New script: `scripts/input_setup.sh` (installs `ibus-bamboo`).
    *   Updated `setup.sh`: Added `--vietnamese` flag.
    *   Updated `README.md`: Documented the new feature.
2.  **Update Files**:
    *   `architecture.md`: Add `scripts/input_setup.sh` to the "Core Components" or "Orchestration Flow" section. Update the diagram if necessary (text description is fine).
    *   `product.md`: Add the `--vietnamese` option to "Modes and Options" and mention it in the "Typical Flow".
    *   `tech.md`: Add `ibus-bamboo` to "Core System Tools" or "Applications and Services".
    *   `context.md`: Update "Recent Changes" to include this feature implementation.
3.  **Verify**: Ensure the documentation accurately reflects the new capability.

### Orchestration Diagram

```mermaid
flowchart TD
  A[User runs ./setup.sh] --> B[Parse CLI flags]
  B --> C[Pre-flight checks via scripts/common.sh]
  C --> D[Run scripts/core_setup.sh]
  D --> E[Optionally run scripts/vscode_setup.sh]
  E --> F[Optionally run scripts/qdrant_setup.sh]
  F --> G[Optionally run scripts/godot_setup.sh]
  G --> H[Optionally run scripts/apps_setup.sh]
  H --> I[Conditionally run scripts/packettracer_setup.sh]
  I --> J[Optionally run scripts/enhance_terminal.sh]
  J --> K[Print completion summary and next steps]
```
=======
  6. [`scripts/packettracer_setup.sh`](../../scripts/packettracer_setup.sh:1) (if not skipped and installer `.deb` exists)
  7. [`scripts/input_setup.sh`](../../scripts/input_setup.sh:1) (when `--vietnamese` is provided)
  8. [`scripts/enhance_terminal.sh`](../../scripts/enhance_terminal.sh:1) (when `--enhance` is provided)
- Provides summary output and reminders (e.g., log out/in to pick up default shell changes).

### Orchestration Diagram

```mermaid
flowchart TD
  A[User runs ./setup.sh] --> B[Parse CLI flags]
  B --> C[Pre-flight checks via scripts/common.sh]
  C --> D[Run scripts/core_setup.sh]
  D --> E[Optionally run scripts/vscode_setup.sh]
  E --> F[Optionally run scripts/qdrant_setup.sh]
  F --> G[Optionally run scripts/godot_setup.sh]
  G --> H[Optionally run scripts/apps_setup.sh]
  H --> I[Conditionally run scripts/packettracer_setup.sh]
  I --> J[Optionally run scripts/input_setup.sh]
  J --> K[Optionally run scripts/enhance_terminal.sh]
  K --> L[Print completion summary and next steps]
```

  - Locates a Cisco Packet Tracer `.deb` installer.
  - Installs necessary Qt5 dependencies and performs non-interactive installation.

## Assets and Configuration Layout
=======
- [`scripts/packettracer_setup.sh`](../../scripts/packettracer_setup.sh:1)
  - Locates a Cisco Packet Tracer `.deb` installer.
  - Installs necessary Qt5 dependencies and performs non-interactive installation.
  - Integrates Packet Tracer into the system.

- [`scripts/input_setup.sh`](../../scripts/input_setup.sh:1)
  - Installs `ibus` and `ibus-bamboo` for Vietnamese input.
  - Configures environment variables (`GTK_IM_MODULE`, `QT_IM_MODULE`, `XMODIFIERS`) in `~/.profile`.

@@ -68,6 +69,7 @@
 - **Full install**: `./setup.sh` (default, all components enabled).
 - **Minimal**: `./setup.sh --minimal` (core terminal setup only; skips Qdrant, Godot, apps, Packet Tracer).
 - **Enhancement only**: `./setup.sh --enhance` (runs just the enhancement script for power tools and enhanced configs).
+- **Vietnamese support**: `./setup.sh --vietnamese` (installs ibus-bamboo input method).
 - **Selective skipping** via `--skip-vscode`, `--skip-qdrant`, `--skip-godot`, `--skip-apps`, `--skip-packettracer`.
 
 ## User Experience Goals

Updated Memory Bank to document Vietnamese input support:

- [`architecture.md`](.kilocode/rules/memory-bank/architecture.md:36): Added `scripts/input_setup.sh` to orchestration flow and diagram
- [`product.md`](.kilocode/rules/memory-bank/product.md:53): Added `--vietnamese` option to Typical Flow and Modes sections
- [`tech.md`](.kilocode/rules/memory-bank/tech.md:34): Added `ibus-bamboo` under Core System Tools
- [`context.md`](.kilocode/rules/memory-bank/context.md:16): Added Vietnamese input implementation to Recent Changes

Committed as `docs(memory-bank): add Vietnamese input support to documentation`
